Text.description: Describes a Property, which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.

Timestamp.description: Describes a Property which contains the date and time with an optional timezone.

serialNumber.description: This is the "real-world" identification of an object, which is bound to be destructed. In case of a complete vehicle, which was in circulation before, it has to be the VAN.

issuer.description: BPMN of the business partner who creates this certificate, usually a dismantler.

issueDate.description: This is the date when the item has been decommissioned by the issuer.

revocationDate.description: This is the date when the  decommission certificate is revoked by the issuer. This only happens in exceptional cases when a vehicle has been marked as decommissioned by error or any other error is made in the issuance of the certificate
